p:
The difference between the antimicrobial activity of each biosynthesized AuNPs can be explained by the phytochemical composition of each extract and fraction
70 . According to a bio-guided study of Brazilian red propolis extract and its fractions, the crude extract and hexane fraction showed the highest antimicrobial activity against microorganisms, including S. aureus and E. coli. This activity can be related to the presence of medicarpin, elemicin, and vestitol
71, 72 . Therefore, the medicarpin and vestitol we quantified in the BRP crude extract might have contributed to the antimicrobial effect of the BRP extract and AuNP dichloromethane.
